reviews.review_msg: I have taken 2 class with Noel, and he is great! His teaching style is old school - no online submissions/canvas or power point presentations. lectures can feel long sometimes, but always informative. If you are truly passionate about anthropology you will appreciate and enjoy his classes although I may not recommend for ppl who aren't.

Um, confusing and kind of intimidating. He has these answers that he's looking for but he doesn't really know how to frame his questions properly. Assignments aren't explained too clearly...just confused. Weird class.
Simply the best professor in the department!
Great teacher, very respectful of students.Highly recommended. Lots of reading--it is interesting.

Dara is amazing! She is extremely approachable inside and outside of class. She creates a great atmosphere with her classroom. She managed to get everyone engaged even though it was an 8:30am class. Lots of reading, but if you can keep up her classes are very interesting. I definitely recommend her!
